value.0:
Phrase representing dragon's ideology: "We bring joy and laughter to innocent hearts."

Description of dragon type: Copper dragons are powerful jumpers and climbers, with massive thighs and shoulders. A copper dragon's head has a short face and no beak. Broad, smooth browplates jut over the eyes, and long, flat coppery horns extend back from the browplates in a series of segments. The dragon also has backswept cheek ridges and frills on the backs of the lower jaws that sweep forward slightly. Layers of triangular blades point down from the chin, and as the dragon gets older more layers with larger blades develop. The dragon has a long tongue that comes to a single point. A copper dragon's pupils fade with age, and the eyes of a great wyrm resemble glowing turquoise orbs.

Copper dragons have a stony odor.

Created by:
Aaliyah
~Gold Dragon Knight of Bahamut~
In Honor of the King of Good Dragons!
